## WorkerServiceProtocol.DestroyServiceRequest interface

This message is sent by the main thread to \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\] to dynamically destroy a service.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface DestroyServiceRequest extends ServiceRequest 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |

|  [targetServiceId](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.destroyservicerequest.targetserviceid.md) | string | Id of service to be destroyed. |
